resources.string: Do you wish to exit the app?
Would you like to save this course entry?
Are you sure you would like to discard this course entry? It will not be saved.
Select whether you want to save or get rid of your course entry by clicking either the icon at the top right corner to discard or the button at the bottom to save it.

Please make sure that you have entered both the course name and the course code. If you do not have a course code, enter an arbitrary value of your liking or a value easy for you to remember that you attribute to the course.
Please make sure that you have entered valid characters for both the course name and the course code. Both the fields only accept english alphabets, numbers, spaces, and - only.
A course with this course code already exists. Either inspect and delete that course entry first, or create a course with a different course code.
Course NOT deleted. Entered value did not match requested value.

Enter general information for this course. Don\'t worry, you will be able to add further detailed information about this course after creating this subject entry. Please use english alphabets, numbers, space and - only. This only applies to the entries on this page and nowhere else.
No courses available!\n\nClick the + button to add a course!
No notes available!\n\nClick the + button to add a note!
Are you sure you wish to discard the edits just made to this note?
Are you sure you wish to discard this note? It will note be saved.
Do you wish to save this note?
Please enter a title for your new note.

Are you sure you would like to delete this course and all information and notes pertaining to it? This action is irreversible. To confirm your decision, type the following word in the below field and press YES:
Are you sure you wish to delete this note? This action cannot be reversed.
Would you like to back up your courses and their respective notes? The backup file will be placed on your phone\'s Download directory.
Would you like to restore your courses and their respective notes form a backup file? WARNING: This will erase all current data on the application and replace them with data from the backup file.
Please grant storage permissions from phone\'s settings menu.
To add a course, click the + icon on the homepage, then write the course code and name you wish to add then click save.
To add notes, click and open course you wish to add notes to then click view course notes and then click + icon on the top right corner.
To add Reminders, click the bell icon on the homepage, then click the + icon on top right corner. Fill in details about your reminder then click save.
